english: He has diffidence in expressing his opinions .
chinese: 他表达意见时缺乏自信。

english: His fault is that he's too diffident .
chinese: 他的过失是太缺乏自信啦。

english: She lacked the courage of her convictions .
I always have been deficient in selfconfidence and decision .
chinese: 我向来缺乏自信和果断。

english: His public speaking manner is still not very assured .
chinese: 他演讲的神态还显出有点缺乏自信。
缺乏自信造句挺难的，這是一个万能造句的方法

english: He sought to obscure his lack of assurance by boisterousness, and his sense of latent inadequacy by occasional bullying .
chinese: 他老是试图用吵吵嚷嚷的言词来掩饰他的缺乏自信，有时则靠吓唬人来掩饰他的外强中干。

english: Not unconscious in the outset of the inferiority of my qualifications, experience in my own eyes, perhaps still more in the eyes of others, has strengthened the motives to diffidence of myself .
chinese: 就任之初，我并非不知道我的能力薄弱，而且我自己的经历更使我缺乏自信，这在别人看来，恐怕更是如此。

english: The teacher lacked assurance in front of his class
chinese: 那位教师在学生面前缺乏自信。

english: Self - distrust is the cause of most of our failure
chinese: 我们的失败多数是由于缺乏自信。

english: Self - distrust is the cause of our most failure
chinese: 缺乏自信是大部分失败的原因。

english: Hugh blames his mother for his lack of confidence
chinese: 休把他的缺乏自信归罪于他的母亲。

english: Self - distrust is the cause of most our failures
chinese: 我们大多数的人失败都是因为缺乏自信

english: His public speaking manner is still not very assured
chinese: 他演讲的神态还显出有点缺乏自信

english: Self - distrust is the cause of most of our failures
chinese: 我们绝大多数的失败都是因为缺乏自信之故

english: 27 self - distrust is the cause of most of our failure
chinese: 我们绝大多数的失败都是因为缺乏自信。
